com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface TitanGraphQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.blueprints.GraphQuery, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query

    public interface TitanGraphQuery
extends com.tinkerpop.blueprints.GraphQuery
    Constructs a query against an external index to retrieve all elements (either vertices or edges) that match all conditions. Finding matching elements using this query mechanism requires that appropriate index structures have been defined for the keys. See TypeMaker.indexed(Class) and TypeMaker.indexed(String, Class).
    Since:
    0.3.0
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query

        com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Query.Compare
